content.question: The trend from 1950 to 1965 shown in the graph was most directly the result of which of the following?

choices.label: The displacement of large numbers of Europeans caused by the Second World War
The increasing Cold War tensions between communist and noncommunist countries in Europe
The growing popularity of feminist ideas

topic.text: 9.14: 20th- and 21st-Century Culture, Arts, and Demographic Trends

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
